name: Dreamdiver
simple_desc: Increases an ally's CRIT DMG and Advances Forward their action.
desc:
Increases the CRIT DMG of a single ally by #1[f1]% of Sparkle's CRIT DMG plus #2[f1]%, lasting for #3[i] turn(s). And at the same time, Advances Forward this ally's action by #4[i]%.
When Sparkle uses this ability on herself, the Action Advance effect will not trigger.
